title.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Dec. 21, 1894. Contributions for St. Hyacinth Parish

div.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Dec. 21, 1894. CONTRIBUTIONS FOR ST. HYACINTH PARISH

body.p: A beautiful monstrance valued at sixty-five dollars and a silver chalice valued at fifty dollars have been given to the new St. Hyacinth Church by Mr. Panten. Francis Okon has donated pontificals valued at one hundred and five dollars. A certain individual has given a missal and a desk valued at $43.50. God bless all donors.
